about_the_game:
Collect & Build a Deck of Over 400+ unique cards

The world of Delicards offers a vast spectrum of recipes, ingredients, seeds and special cards for you to collect and use while cooking. There are various vendors that sell card packs of rare spices and historical recipes for you to meet your customers' demand or help you win contests.

Participate in special events, contests and cooking shows

Cook for army generals, feed the homeless, become the #1 contestant in Kard Kitchen show and impress the food critics that randomly show up in your restaurant in order to gain popularity and fame for your cooking skills.

Explore the international cuisine

There are more than 100+ unique recipe cards from all over the world. Each one comes with a real-world recipe, together with in-game rewards, combos and bonuses. Enrich your experience with unique taste combinations and impress your customers.

Grow fresh ingredients on the spot

Using fresh parsley or tomatoes is incomparable to frozen alternatives - make use of the Seed cards and plan your cooking accordingly in order to give your customer's taste buds that UMAMI taste.
Customise your restaurant, grow your card collection and level up your skills in order to earn the 3 Michelin Stars award, together with the in-game 80+ achievements.
detailed_description:
Collect & Build a Deck of Over 400+ unique cards

The world of Delicards offers a vast spectrum of recipes, ingredients, seeds and special cards for you to collect and use while cooking. There are various vendors that sell card packs of rare spices and historical recipes for you to meet your customers' demand or help you win contests.

Participate in special events, contests and cooking shows

Cook for army generals, feed the homeless, become the #1 contestant in Kard Kitchen show and impress the food critics that randomly show up in your restaurant in order to gain popularity and fame for your cooking skills.

Explore the international cuisine

There are more than 100+ unique recipe cards from all over the world. Each one comes with a real-world recipe, together with in-game rewards, combos and bonuses. Enrich your experience with unique taste combinations and impress your customers.

Grow fresh ingredients on the spot

Using fresh parsley or tomatoes is incomparable to frozen alternatives - make use of the Seed cards and plan your cooking accordingly in order to give your customer's taste buds that UMAMI taste.
Customise your restaurant, grow your card collection and level up your skills in order to earn the 3 Michelin Stars award, together with the in-game 80+ achievements.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS / Ubuntu
  • Processor: Core i5+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Built In
  • Sound Card: Built In

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: Core i5 / M1 +
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Built In
  • Sound Card: Built In

name: Delicards - A Delicious Card Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: 4+ Cores
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Built In / Any
  • Sound Card: Built In
  • VR Support: Coming Soon

short_description: Imagine being a chef at a restaurant, but instead of enduring the heat of the kitchen, you're using trading cards portraying recipes, ingredients, seeds and special cards. Compete, Earn, Grow and Collect cards from all over the world and become #1 Kard Chef.
